FileDialogWizard.__callForm

__callForm(editor, variant)

Private method to display a dialog and get the code.

editor (Editor)
reference to the current editor
variant (int)
variant of code to be generated (-1 = E5FileDialog, 0 = unknown, 5 = PyQt5)
Return:
the generated code (string)

FileDialogWizard.__handle

__handle(variant)

Private method to handle the wizards action.

variant (str)
dialog variant to be generated (E5FileDialog or QFileDialog)
Raises ValueError:
raised to indicate an illegal file dialog variant
